law.history: Repealed 1985 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 41, effective June 30, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 22. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 5, effective July 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Signatures on bonds -- Quorum -- Meetings -- Bylaws -- Rules and regulations.
